Directives > ui-project-tile

ui-project-tile

New


<ui-project-tile project-name="Test project" new-project="true" nn-enter="projectTileEnter()"></ui-project-tile>

Standard Project Tile with all options


<ui-project-tile project-name="Test project" 
                 project-image="url(../resources/angular-sap-ui-elements/assets/sample_project.png)"
                 project-users="users">
</ui-project-tile>

Invite accept/reject Project Tile


<ui-project-tile accept-action="projectTileAccept()" 
                 reject-action="projectTileReject()" 
                 show-footer="true" 
                 project-name="Test project" 
                 project-image="url(../resources/angular-sap-ui-elements/assets/sample_project.png)"
                 project-users="users">
</ui-project-tile>
